message: Let's split fairly, I'll take a bit more
Let's be fair, Alice. I offered you more than half last round, now it's my turn for a slight advantage. This offer still gets us both a good deal before inflation hurts us.
I'll meet you halfway on your advantage, but I still think I deserve a bit more
Alice, we're letting good money slip away! Let's end this now with a perfectly fair 50/50 split.  Any more haggling and inflation will eat into our profits.
